backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing book store logic, including storage, access control, user profiles, orders, carts, support messages, and admin recovery.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping new purchase confirmation and routing updates to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their purpose and behavior within the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining theme variables for light and dark modes and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint with root container and script loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, toaster, and adds the new purchase confirmation route.
Route guard enforcing admin access and offering login prompts or an admin recovery link when unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states, error handling, and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting first-time authenticated users to enter and save their profile name.
frontend/src/components/books/BookCard.t: Displays a book’s cover, metadata, price, availability, and links to its detail page.
frontend/src/components/books/CoverImage: Displays a static book cover image with fallback SVG on load error.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Generic empty state UI component displaying an icon, title, description, and optional action.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with contact links, chat dialog trigger, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Shows navigation, user balance, cart button, and login controls based on authentication.
frontend/src/components/layout/Layout.ts: Wraps pages with header, footer, and a profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Provides a configurable max‑width container for page content.
frontend/src/components/library/BookCont: Dialog for viewing purchased book content and downloading PDFs with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/library/LibraryP: Button to download a purchased book’s PDF, handling errors and status.
frontend/src/components/support/Customer: Customer support chat dialog allowing message submission and viewing threaded responses.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminRecovery.ts: Mutation hook to call admin recovery and map backend errors to user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving user profiles and checking admin status via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBalance.ts: Hooks to get token balance and mint tokens, invalidating balance after updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useBooks.ts: React-query hooks for fetching and mutating book data, including book lists, individual books, metadata, content, and PDF uploads.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Provides cart queries and mutations plus helpers to merge cart items with book data and compute totals.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for authentication, storing identity state and exposing login utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useLibrary.ts: Builds the user's library from delivered orders and exposes book content fetching helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: React-query hooks to fetch individual orders, user orders, and all orders via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useResetStore.ts: Mutation hook to reset the backend store and invalidate all related caches with permission checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupportChat.ts: Contains support messaging hooks for sending messages, fetching user/admin inboxes, and posting admin replies.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base/styles with custom color variables for light and dark bookstore themes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility for merging Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCatalogPag: Provides an admin interface to list, add, edit, update content, upload PDFs, and delete books in the catalog.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Wraps all admin subpages in a tabbed dashboard inside an admin-protected route.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMintPage.t: Allows admins to mint GLDT tokens by submitting a principal and amount, with validation and feedback.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Lists all orders for administrators, showing customer info, items, totals, and dates.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRecoveryPa: Enables admin access recovery using Internet Identity, showing login prompts, recovery actions, and success feedback.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Admin page providing a UI to reset store data with confirmation dialogs and success/error alerts.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSupportInb: Admin inbox page that displays grouped customer support messages and allows sending replies.
frontend/src/pages/BookDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed info for a single book, handles add‑to‑cart actions, and shows loading or not‑found states.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shows the user’s cart with items, supports removal and checkout navigation, and handles empty or unauthenticated states.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Lists all available books with a search filter and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles the checkout flow including balance checks, order submission, and various login/cart validation states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section and a featured books list.
frontend/src/pages/MyLibraryPage.tsx: Displays the user’s purchased books, supports reading and PDF download, and handles login/loading/empty states.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays order confirmation details, including purchased items and navigation buttons, after fetching order and book data.
frontend/src/pages/PurchaseConfirmationP: Shows a simple purchase completion screen with next-step navigation options using the orderId param.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Utility to download a Uint8Array as a file by creating a temporary Blob URL.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formatting helpers for token amounts, principals, and timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/orderId.ts: Generates a unique order ID using the current timestamp and a random number.
frontend/src/utils/principal.ts: Parses a principal string into a Principal object with validation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project features, state, and pending requests for a post‑purchase confirmation screen.
